definitions.text: specify as a condition or requirement in a contract or agreement; make an express demand or provision in an agreement
examples: The will stipulates that she can live in the house for the rest of her life
The contract stipulates the dates of the payments

definitions.text: give a guarantee or promise of
examples: They stipulated to release all the prisoners

definitions.text: make an oral contract or agreement in the verbal form of question and answer that is necessary to give it legal force
